about_the_game:
In the heart of an abandoned island, among the dark ruins of an extinct volcano, lies a secret that threatens all of humanity.
Forcing to survive in a harsh environment, the Island fights back against every inexperienced survivor who dares to venture this far in search of its mind-bending power.
Your goal is to find the Island Core and take control over it.
It's up to you to be its Master or Destroy it to the ground.
How long can you survive in a post-apocalyptic world where every sunset heralds a new challenge?

The stakes get higher at night!
An underground laboratory harbors a dangerous source of infinite energy.
Every night, it awakens, illuminating the island with an emerald light, spawning monsters from other worlds and saturating the island with electricity.
During the day, the source powers the land from within, causing everything around it to blossom into lush color.

Harness the mysterious energy and use it for your growth.
Explore and evolve during the day.
At night, survive the struggle for valuable supplies.

From abandoned farm to unassailable fortress.
Renovate, protect and fill your shelter with the trophies you conquer.
Decorate your home to your liking and create a cozy space you'll love to return to.
Develop your farming skills in an environment of scarce provisions and fertile soil.



Garage is a travel center
Repair, improve and customize your vehicles for exploration and quick access to far-flung resources.
Travel to remote corners of the Island safely as long as there's fuel in the tank.
For hunting and shooting enthusiasts, a shooting range and armory are available within the garage.



Competition for Power
The military formations protecting the secrets of the island add tactical depth to the game and the need to develop special strategies to face them.
But the bigger threat comes from the Lone Survivors, who have the same goals, but you're not on the same side.
Do you have enough skill to fight as equals?

Under the cover of the Island
Every trip outside the shelter is a balancing act of survival, with extreme weather and bloodthirsty monsters waiting around every corner.
Harness your fears, arm yourself with wits and embark on a dangerous journey both on land and underwater!
Compete against others in a vast and diverse world, from lush pine forests to sinister underground bunkers.

Are you ready for the challenge to save the planet from destruction?
Welcome to Outbreak Island, where each of your actions could be a game-changing one.
Join the battle for the future of Earth!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content.

name: Outbreak Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1 / (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible (5.1 surround sound recommended)
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible (5.1 surround sound recommended)
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse

short_description: Survive on a remote Island, where a mysterious Outbreak awakens bloodthirsty monsters at night. Craft, build and defend your base in the brutal world of Outbreak Island, an open-world sandbox survival horror game.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
